verses.text: Calec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová. Manhxo jantacoc swach'il ko b'itan b'it t'a ko Diosal. Smojton wal ko b'itan t'ay yet' juntzanh b'it te wach'.
Ha Jehová sb'oanxi Jerusalén, ol smolb'ejxicot heb' quetisraelal sacleminac yajkanb'ati.
Ha tz'ak'an sniwanil sk'ol heb' pitz'anoch cuselal t'a spixan. A' tz'anhtan syaelal heb' chi'.
A' na'annac jantac sb'isul k'een k'anal sb'onac, yak'annacoch sb'i junjun k'een.
Yelxo wal te niwan yelk'och ko Diosal tik, niwan spoder, malaj slajwub'al sjelanil.
A' tz'ik'an k'e waan heb' anima emnaquil yeq'ui, palta a heb' sk'ulan chukal, tz'ik'chajkanem heb' sik'lab'il yuj.
Co b'itejec Jehová yic skak'an yuj diosal yet' te' arpa sko b'itejec.
A' tz'ak'anoch asun t'a satcha’anh, slajwi chi' syak'ancot nhab' t'a sat lu'um tik. A' tz'ak'an q'uib' anh ank'ultak t'a tzalquixtac.
Anhejton pax ha' tz'ak'an swael nok' nok' yet' nok' yunetac joj ayic tz'el yav nok' yuj wejel.
Ha Jehová, max tzalajlaj yet' heb' anima tz'ak'anoch yip nok' chej, ma yipal heb' soldado yipoc sk'ool.
Palta stzalaj yet' heb' ay xivk'olal t'ay, aton heb' tz'ak'anoch swach'k'olal yipoc sk'ool.
Ex aj Jerusalén, kalek wach' lolonel t'a Jehová. Ex aj Sion, ko b'itejec ko Diosal.
A' tz'ak'anoch yip yijchuloc spuertail chonhab' Jerusalén, syak'anpax swach'k'olal t'a heb' cuninal.
A' tz'ak'an junk'olal t'a yol smacb'en ko chonhab' tik, syak'anpax b'ud'joc yuj ixim trigo te wach'.
A' tz'ak'ancot slolonel t'a sat lu'um tik, elanhchamel tz'elk'ochi.
Ha ko Diosal tz'ak'ancot k'een sacb'akom icha yilji sac lana. A' tz'ak'anoch k'een cheev pokokal, icha k'een tik'aq'uil taanh tz'ajkan k'een.
A' tz'ak'ancot k'een sacb'at icha k'een cotac k'een. Axo wal sical k'een, malaj junok mach stechaj yuj.
Syalanpaxi to tz'ulaxb'at k'een, syak'ancot ik', yic sb'ey yalil k'een chi'.
Ha slolonel yet' sk'ayb'ub'al, ix yak' cojtaquejel a onh israel yinhtilal onh winhaj Jacob tik.
Manh ichocta' ix yutej t'a junocxo nación. Maj yojtaquejel-laj sk'ayb'ub'al ko Diosal juntzanhxo chonhab' chi'. Calec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová.
